Articles.Content: Stock version of Xannari's rover created. Now we just need someone to send it to Eve.

Done with the attachment of the Duna-Ike lander. Save file uploaded.

My turn is done. (Imgur album uploading)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/RSdvV)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-09T23:21:15Z" title="03/09/2015 11:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 9, 2015</time> by Starwhip**

Currently still in testing for the Tylo rescue vessel. I came so close to landing, but I hit a torque glitch right at the end, and it spun me out of control. Not the best times right now... But I'll keep trooping on.

UPDATE: Testing wasn't successful. I'll need extra time to redesign.

...Or I could help out with the Duna ship.

Anyone need more rovers? I need something to do.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T01:43:00Z" title="03/10/2015 01:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

I call dibs after whoever!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-09T23:58:32Z" title="03/09/2015 11:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 9, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**
Hey, I can't access the docs folder anymore. Is it a problem on my end?
I'm getting the save then, Raincrafter next!
Is anyone else having problems accessing the shared folder? Musil can only preview and not edit.
I think it's just me. Monstah and you did edit files after I could no longer access them. For some reason, they still show up on my side bar... So... blame my internet.

> 
> I think it's just me. Monstah and you did edit files after I could no longer access them. For some reason, they still show up on my side bar... So... blame my internet.

Did you "Open in Drive"?

I've still got it.

It's definitely a problem with my drive. I am unable to open anything using the "Open in Drive" option.

Thanks for the concern, guys.

*EDIT: solved. Don't know how or why, but it fixed itself.* 

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T02:14:39Z" title="03/10/2015 02:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Musil**
Man, that's one fine looking Duna lander!

> 
> Man, that's one fine looking Duna lander!

You could fly it. Now that the Conqueror's done, it's ready for whoever to take it for a spin.

Just remember to leave some fuel at Duna.

The stranding of Correy with images. I am thinking about doing a full mission log... but not sure if there is a point to it, really. 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/URYaG)

I was unable to get any nice screenshot's of Correy at Tylo because I noticed too late the moon is tidally locked and Jool never rises where I landed.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T02:50:53Z" title="03/10/2015 02:50  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Musil**

> 
> You could fly it. Now that the Conqueror's done, it's ready for whoever to take it for a spin.
> Just remember to leave some fuel at Duna.

One second...

133.02 = M1

37.02 = M0

If my numbers are correct, you have about 10035.9 m/s of Delta-V for the drive section while the lander is full, and about 11421.153 m/s of Delta-V when it's empty. Somewhere in between is the amount you actually have, so yes, this ship is totally overpowered. LES DO IT!

> 
> NOTE: We're supposed to leave 2 full Orange tanks and 2 NERVA engines behind in Duna orbit.

Launch only, not return. I can't do return calculations, because I don't know how much Delta-V will be used in the transfer, or how much fuel will be left when the return trip comes. 

Also, building rovers. Wont be here for a few minutes.

EDIT: What's this in the project ideas folder? "Moho expedition"? I suppose that's the next best thing besides Eeloo.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T03:37:09Z" title="03/10/2015 03:37  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

NOTE: We're supposed to leave 2 full Orange tanks and 2 NERVA engines behind in Duna orbit.

> 
> NOTE: We're supposed to leave 2 full Orange tanks and 2 NERVA engines behind in Duna orbit.

Not necessarily full, just anything we can manage.

Failed at launching last night, will make an album out of the attempt and try again soon...

(I got them back alive at least)

- - - Updated - - -

Attempt to dock at polar station. First lesson from last night (before this attempt, local save): 4600m/s does not a stock launch make.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/PX2rr)

(test. never used imgur before.)

Well. If at first you don't succeed....

Plus, this ship has some KAS storage on the cupola, and the save worked just fine without it installed. I think it works!

So, I'm launching it with a spare OX 2x3 panel and a Z100 tucked in.

- - - Updated - - -

Uh. How do I imgur?

- - - Updated - - -

Done!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T13:40:47Z" title="03/10/2015 01:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by monstah**

With perfect gravity turn, 4600 d-V should put you in a stock orbit... Depending on other things too, like TWR.

I also had some trouble yesterday learning how to imgur. Felt a bit silly when I figured it out. 

How did you get the Visual Enhancement mod to work? Tried it once with 0.90 and it was all pixels. And then there is a huge discussion on the thread of people trying unsuccessfully to make it work...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T14:51:08Z" title="03/10/2015 02:51  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Musil**

>

> 
> How did you get the Visual Enhancement mod to work? Tried it once with 0.90 and it was all pixels. And then there is a huge discussion on the thread of people trying unsuccessfully to make it work...

Really? I just installed the lo-res version from CKAN.

I gotta re-learn my stock launch profiles...

> 
> I gotta re-learn my stock launch profiles...

Yeah, it was weird for me too when I stopped using FAR. But I was a bit fed up with it... Can't wait for stock aerodynamics.
Done! Polar Kerbin station renamed Chronus. 6 seats and 9 docking ports available! Save file uploaded.

I could probably keep sane for going after Raincrafter, but if anyone wants to go before me, just say so. I'm not in a rush.

But if I do, I'd take the rover to Eve, and maybe a few fuel canisters.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-10T20:16:25Z" title="03/10/2015 08:16  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 10, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/m7Zsw)

- - - Updated - - -

There's two scientists in the lab (in case they ever become useful in sandbox), a pilot in the cupola and two engineers on the fore habitation module
This is shaping up rather quickly. I love all of this.
Raincrafter does not appear to be available, someone else may go before him.
